results.definition: (quantifier used with mass nouns) small in quantity or degree; not much or almost none or (with `a') at least some
examples: there's slight chance that it will work
there's a slight chance it will work

results.definition: lacking substance or significance; a fragile claim to fame"
being of delicate or slender build
examples: she was slender as a willow shoot is slender"- Frank Norris
a slim girl with straight blonde hair
watched her slight figure cross the street
